#summary Instructions for performing configuration on a fresh FlightSchool install.

= Configuring Flight School =

After installing the dependencies and initializing the database, there are a few additional configuration steps that are required to make the system fully functional. 

 # With the application webserver running, log in as the admin user.
 # Go to the Scheduling tab, and select Manage Aircraft
 # Click "Edit Aircraft Types", and add the desired aircraft types/categories
 # Return to Manage Aircraft page, and add the school's aircraft
